resources.string:
Developer: Mohammad Nasir Uddin
 Dept. of ICE
 Noakhali Science and Technology University
 Email: nasir.uddin42222@gmail.com

1.If you are a driver then select Driver button and follow the steps:
 Driver button-->Select Vehicle Id
 -->Hold the activity while moving
 2.If you are a user then select User button and follow the steps:
 a)For tracking vehicle then select track button and then:
 Vehicle Track-->Select Vehicle Id
 -->See Map-->Distance and Time
 b)For showing vehicle schedule then select Schedule button
 c)For showing driver details then select driver details button
 3.If you are a admin then select Admin button and follow the steps:
 a)If You are registered then login and update information
 b)If You are not registered then click signUp.
